content: The Rat Archer isn't a boss and fights like any other Rat Archer, so you will be familiar with his move set by the time you encounter him. Choose your times to attack wisely and don't forget to make use of Staff Spin to deflect any incoming projectiles. That is the best way to avoid attacks from any archer.
promot:
This excerpt is taken from the file "Rat_Archer_Spirit.md", within the section "Rat Archer Spirit" and the sub-section "Rat Archer Fight". The content is presented below:

The Rat Archer isn't a boss and fights like any other Rat Archer, so you will be familiar with his move set by the time you encounter him. Choose your times to attack wisely and don't forget to make use of Staff Spin to deflect any incoming projectiles. That is the best way to avoid attacks from any archer.
